channel.title: manifest on Dev Log
channel.description: Recent content in manifest on Dev Log

item.title: Android / Fullscreen Splash
item.description: Fullscreen Activity AndroidManifest.xml <activity android:name=".SplashActivity" android:screenOrientation="portrait" android:theme="@style/AppTheme.NoActionBar"> <intent-filter> <action android:name="android.intent.action.MAIN" /> <category android:name="android.intent.category.LAUNCHER" /> </intent-filter> </activity> values/v23/styles <style name="AppTheme.NoActionBar"> <item name="windowActionBar">false</item> <item name="windowNoTitle">true</item> <item name="android:windowLightStatusBar">true</item> </style> values/styles <style name="AppTheme.NoActionBar"> <item name="windowActionBar">false</item> <item name="windowNoTitle">true</item> </style>
